short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boot a Chromebook into developer mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Casserole is a developmental project I am currently working on for my Computer Science class to inject custom code into the bootloader. This was intended for educational purposes.
